name: Bird-O-Tron
description:
Bird-O-Tron. A solo effort of Code, Pixel Art and Music!

You are a Dragon Hawk that has been assigned to defend the Sacred Avian Sanctum.

2D Pixel Art Retro Arcade Game inspired by Joust / Robotron and a few other things.

Gamepad or Keyboard control.

Java is required (application only, not the web plugin).

Get Ready! :-)
